website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated pedicure kit providing users with high-quality nail tools at an affordable price.
pros: Comes in a 12-piece set, allowing for the ultimate in-home pedicure
cons: A few buyers had problems with the product arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Best manicure kit on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This was an unexpected/ impulse buy, but I am glad that I did. I love this set, it superseded my expectations, and they really should show how cute the outside of the set is! The clippers are very comfortable in your hands and do not struggle on thick nails! If you have extremely thick toe nails/ finger nails, the pliers also work super great, but I didnt really need them! :) Definitely the best manicure set I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this manicure/pedicure set!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this manicure/pedicure kit. It looks well made and nicely presentable with its case. I originally bought 2 sets and bought another 2 sets for Christmas gifts. Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: gpc

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is more than worth the price. I have used the nail clippers, cuticle clippers, cuticle pusher, and pimple tool. All have worked great. I was especially surprised by the usefulness of the pimple tool. One end is super sharp so you pierce the pimple and then you use the circle end to press out the clog. Be sure to disinfect with rubbing alcohol before and after! The case is very nice looking and I would even consider giving this set as a gift because the quality is terrific and the price is very affordable. It looks more expensive than what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: KU Grad 02

customer_reviews.title: Cute Case, Nice Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: This kit seems to be pretty good quality, which I wasn't really expecting. There was a flash deal on it, so I kind of ordered this on a whim, because who doesn't need a manicure set? I just kind of glanced at the product before buying, and expected the case to be soft and cheaply made. On the contrary, it seems to be fairly well made, and the case is cushy fabric on a metal casing. It looks like a proper clutch. It's actually pretty cute, too. Overall, I'm pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, good quality set to have around.
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I was going to say great set for the price but that would be unfair. I actually got it for less than the current price but I think it's still worth every penny of the current price if not more. My wife saw it this morning (I bought it for myself and used several times before) and fell in love with it, especially the "pretty case." I like the quality of what's inside the case and the quality of the case itself (I couldn't care less if it's pretty or not).
customer_reviews.author: Louj6500

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Horrible and cheap. The whole set is not sharp and very dull and didn’t work properly. The cuticle very dull. The trimmer opened and just shut, very annoying when you’re try to cut around the cuticle. The clippers get stuck when you go down to clip and it you have to wedge it to open.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Cheap product. The endows are rough and the clippers are not sharp. One of the pieces broke when I tried to use it. The outside case is not cute either. Brown with the company name stamped on it.
customer_reviews.author: jendy15

customer_reviews.title: great tools for evry day use
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this for a while. went to some of the stores in La one nail cutter was sailing at the price of two of these. to have the all box at a price less than the price of one nail cutter. it was a no brainer to say the least. I grabbed 2 one for my other half. I will recommend it to every one.
customer_reviews.author: florent mbesse

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers slide right off my hair or just break the hair off halfway down. The nail clippers only bend my nails unless I soak my nails before cutting them, which I usually do, but if you just want to even out a nail you broke, it's really difficult. The case was falling apart when I got it; it definitely won't hold up in travel.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Mani/Pedi Time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely set! The design of the travel vase is stunning. Very impressed, being that this purchase was very reasonable priced. You would almost think you're carrying an upscale, luxurious case! Each tool seems to be made with detail, quality metal and everything needed for those in between professional mani/pedi appointments! We actual used one of the tools for our bunny's toenails. Sanitized and dried it. No corrosion or reaction so far! So worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Classic

customer_reviews.title: A very nice sharp set of clippers and other tools.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of nail clippers and accessories. Very sharp and easy to store. With the assortment of clippers I find the whole set useful. Since I often travel carry on, the inclusion of the sharp scissors means I can’t pavk it for inspection and I don’t like the idea of breaking up the nice set to accommodate this fact and have to leave it home.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: They actually don’t work. I loved the kit, plenty of nice tools and nice package. However, I went to use the clippers and couldn’t use them. The don’t open wide enough to fit your nail in. See oic
customer_reviews.author: ScooterK

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a sale because the last set we owned wasn't doing the job anymore. I did not expect these to perform as well as they did because of the price as we just needed something for clipping nails during pedicures, but they worked perfectly, better than the more expensive set previously owned. Pedicure time was cut down drastically because I was able to clip the nails in one try, unlike some of the others. The case is very nice, and it is sturdy enough to hold all of the equipment without having to squeeze the tools back into their slots. I would definitely buy this for someone as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Truly a value product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent combination of little tools to keep your most important finger nails and toe nails trimmed, neat and clean - in a painless way! Good compact packaging inside a beautiful looking case, this is a valuable item to have in everyone's vanity cupboard. Plus, it is so compact and light for travel. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyJoy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I bought this product except it was a lightening deal and I'm a sucker for bargains. Very poor quality. Flimsy. Took one item out of the container and flexed. Bent with very little pressure. Junk. Don't waste your money (like I did). Immediately went into thriftshop donation box. BTW, warning for anyone with small children. There are some very sharp points on items in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: deber

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied with a quality made product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man so a lot of things included are foreign to me and I don't use, but they all seem to be quality made. The things I have used though - the small wire cutter-like nippers to use on my tough toenails (the ones I tried my toolbox were too big - lol), the toenail and fingernail clippers, the tweezers and the small scissors work well and that thing with the V-tip for cuticles came in handy and worked fine the couple of times I used it. The case is sturdy, opens and closes easily, and when it snaps shut it stays closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk D. Skorzak

customer_reviews.title: Manicure kit
customer_reviews.text: Great set of manicure tools in handy sized kit. The kit has beautiful cover. The latch on kit doesn’t work. Ok for my purposes I ordered 3 kits as we have them at each of our chairs where we sit in evening. I just slide them in the boxes they came in. Would be hard to travel with them though and would be hard to give as gift when it won’t stay closed. For my purposes they are fine. I don’t need or want replacements. It’s probably just a minor adjustment that can be made to make them stay closed for your future shipments.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: The casing is pretty poorly made, but tools within are good
customer_reviews.text: The casing fell apart within around 5 months. I don't do anything with it either except have it sit on a shelf, so it literally just unraveled on its own, which is suggestive of poor quality. Other than that it did its job pretty well... the tools are excellent and so far haven't broken down, so there's that. 3 stars however for the inconvenience of a shoddy container, since that means I'll have to spend extra just to purchase a replacement to hold the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chrestomanci

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Built to last and a price that can’t be beat for its value.
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy and didn’t think too much about nail clippers or tweezing my eyebrows however since getting this product I am amazed at how much I self care my nails and eyebrows. The price is fantastic and the products are built to last. I can see this set lasting for a decade as long as I take care of them (which I do). This is a must, especially when traveling. The only thing I could have done without is the elaborate and admiringly feminine design of the case, but who cares; you’ll likely be using these in the privacy of your own bathroom :D.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cuticle trimmer and scissors don’t work...
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved the product I was really excited to use it. I tried using the cuticle trimmer and scissors and they both would get stuck and not able to use it properly which I really needed the most. Also the gold paint on the outside washes away super fast. Keep it away from water.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy tools
customer_reviews.text: This case has everything. The tools have substance. They don't bend easily, and are comfortable to use and control. Didn't know some of the tools so I looked up info on You Tube, that helped. It's more than just a mani/pedi case. Also the case is quite nice and will make it safe for travel. I wanted something to keep handy so I wouldn't have to go get my nail case for a simple repair. All-in-all I'm very pleased with this product. It would make a great gift and the price makes it affordable. I've paid the same for just one item in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: The tools appear to work great. Haven't had a chance or a reason to use all of them yet. My only complaint, and I would hazard to guess this would be a problem with any kit you purchase, is it does not come with instructions on what each tool is to be used for. I looked up one YouTube video and they used one tool for one thing but another video used that tool for a different purpose. I guess neither is wrong but a clue, or at a least a NAME for each item, would be of great help.
customer_reviews.author: Lemonobsessed

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Kit came in a dented box. The carry case is more chic than expected and for the items contained within. This product is not made of high quality. What did I expect at $7.99? The tools have finger smudge marks all over them. The scissors do not line up to cut. The tweezers are a joke; they wouldn't be able to pick up a nautical rope. However, the tools perform their function. Areas that are to be sharp, ARE. I was surprised by that. The angled clippers are perfect for my newborn's nails.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor M.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set based on reviews and honestly I'm not impressed. Yes, it comes with all you need an more and it is in a case, which is good for travel. BUT... the tools inside aren't really good quality. Obviously for the price I wasn't expecting the best of the best, but these clippers don't even cut nails without tearing them. Also, the case ripped after a week (and it had sat untouched in a drawer the whole time, so go figure!) I personally would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JNun

customer_reviews.title: Cute & functional
customer_reviews.text: Comes in such a cute little case! There are no pictures of the case itself on the product listing, but I was pleasantly surprised eith the design upon opening the box. Includes a plethora of tiny tools for all of your maniuring needs. Can easily fit in any size purse. I'm in love! And for the price, what a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Case- A Good Variety of Tools
customer_reviews.text: The set comes with a variety of grooming tools. The beautiful case snaps together and is easily opened by "pressing in" on the connection area. Honestly, I just wanted the nice case and some more scissors, ha ha. CONS: The nose hair clippers are very stiff and extremely sharp at the end, so be careful. PRO: The nail filer is separate from the manicure/pedicure clips. That is a plus. My only disappointment is that a mustache comb couldn't be part of this nice grooming kit. But it doesn't advertise one to be included. It's just my wishful thinking. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Do Not BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy on scales bad. Product comes with 2 weights to test. I tare scale and placed both on and test ranged from .25 to .45 over weight. Also received cracked lid. Contacted seller and was told not to use the test weights that came with scale are bad and to weight a nickel. The comments received where rude and at first they would only replace lid. Scales DO NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: ThisGuyZac

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These grooming kits are very cheaply made and really don't do the job they were intended to do. You're better off purchasing the pieces you need and paying for something that actually works. I didn't send them back cause I should have known they were poor quality in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: shannon taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tseoa Manicure, Pedicure Kit, Nail Trim Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything I need for my grooming needs. Although I have only used a few of the tools since I have purchased it, but pleased that I don't have to buy additional tools for everyday grooming when this has literally everything needed. Comes in a nice convenient slim securable kit which fits anywhere. Recommend to my Family and friends definitely! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit.  Better quality than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during a lightening deal. Usually when I get a manicure kit there are a bunch of things I don't use, but this one really has some nice and useful tools. The cuticle nipper is sharp and thin enough to get into the crevices around the nail. The case is pretty nice quality too. All in all a good deal that I've found very useful to have around.
customer_reviews.author: #1 DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so at first I was thinking that these would come in and be a total waste of money because of how amazing the price was. Totally will never do that again! Not only were the price on these amazing but they work! They are durable and just like pictured. I ordered the first one for myself and then a second one for my husband. He uses it all the time now! It even has a pimple popper in there! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, very feminine case with unsightly label.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband because none of this pics showed the outside of the case. Knocking one star off for the case. It's got their brand name hugely stamped on the outside (which I wouldn't like if it was a recognizable company, this is definitely not), and the pattern is gold scrollwork. The tools are nice, the inside of the case is great. Would have given it 5 stars if a plain black case (which is what I assumed it would be because of the lack of pics when I ordered) was what I got.
customer_reviews.author: ChristienPS

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Beautiful case keeps more instruments than I know how to use in perfect order. Now, just because I’m not a manicurist and knowkedable about the proper use of every implement doesn’t mean I do not know the good quality of those tools I do rightly know. As a crafter, I’ve found numerous uses for all the tools I do not rightly know so this is a win all around. I’m ordering more sets as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: HPH Trinket

customer_reviews.title: You're getting what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Sure is this a cheap manicure set, yup. But it does that it advertises. You get clippers of all sorts and some extra tools I don't know what to do with. Yes, the tools feel cheap but for the price, you can't complain. If you're complaining about the quality, you should have forked out more cash for a better set
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The price was too good to be true. You basically get what you pay for. The cuticle cutter is difficult to use and not super sharp, the tweezers can really grip hairs. It’s a pretty dull set of grooming tools. The casing isn’t even aligned, so you have to squeeze super hard to shut it. Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Monica S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the 7 bucks. Not very durable case.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved in what looks like used condition. Case wont close the clasp is broken. I took a picture of it in the box before taking it out and after, cute case cheaply made. Definitely got what I paid for so I'll stop complaining. Haven't tested the actual nail clippers or supplies yet, I'll update my review once I do.
customer_reviews.author: BRI.G

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive kit
customer_reviews.text: The individual tools included work great, with the exception of the nail file. It's just cheaply made and you'd be better served by replacing it with a better one or some emery boards. This kit has some tools in it that I don't even know how to use, but rather have that than be missing some of the pieces I regularly use. There was a problem with the case on my original order, but the company took good care of me in replacing it, A++ on customer service!
customer_reviews.author: The consumer's voice

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The whole kit is very cheaply made. There is a reason this whole kit is under $10.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Great case but that is it
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but that is where it ends. Implements are very cheaply made and will not hold up - sent mine back. Do not waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I decided to grab this kit. My kids and my husband and I used to misplace nail clippers all the time but this convenient little case keeps it all together. Contains everything you might need to keep up on your finger nails. Great variety and great value. Absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collection of various tools. There are many tools to use, for different purposes and/or situations. I've used several of the tools many times and they are both very useful and work great for specific applications! I certainly recommend this versatile product!
customer_reviews.author: cotrekker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need to keep your nails in great shape. The case is decent and everything fits nicely. I’m very pleased with the heft and quality of the clippers but the cuticle nippers aren’t of the same standard. That said, it’s still a great set at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love this buy!
customer_reviews.text: There are instruments in this set that I have never seen before. That didn't stop me from trying them. My toes are looking so pretty and I was able to get a hang nail that was bothering me as well. I was also thinking about purchasing this for others as a gift. Cute look, great size and it snaps shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I've bought similar kits in the past. I expected this one to be the same - cheap, not well made, clippers fall apart after a couple months. But I love the sturdy case and the clippers seem actually pretty sturdy and the metal is way better than in those other kits I've bought. I haven't had this one long enough to tell, but I feel more confident in this kit than those others.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself a few months ago and I had to give it to my daughter she kept using it and would forget to return it. So this is my second one, no matter my need it has the tool. I take it everywhere. It never fails to meet and exceed my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Leda Lark

customer_reviews.title: It's fine...but that's it
customer_reviews.text: The thing that I don't like about it was that the clippers are not smooth. I have to close them and open them, the little spring in the cuticle clippers doesn't reopen the clippers after I sqeeze them. I have to manually reopen the cuticle clippers which makes them hard to use. The rest of the things are fine, but overall not too happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P.P.

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a comprehensive kit containing what appears to be well-made tools. I haven't used them yet, so I cannot comment on whether the clippers are sharp. I was less enthused by the quality of the case. It was a bit difficult to open as the fastener seemed to not align well. I bent it a bit and it closes easier now. Overall, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Not for guys
customer_reviews.text: Ok manicure set. However I did not see the outside of the case is SUPER girlie! It has a bunch of swirls and stuff and I bought it for my son. Sadly I never took it out of the box before gifting or would have sent it back. So beware not a guys gift probably
customer_reviews.author: C.Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, I have been thinking about this set for a long time. It is very comfortable to use. It is very compact and does not take up space. It is suitable for home use, and the nail clippers are super easy to use. Lightweight and labor-saving, the materials are sufficient and the workmanship is also great and easy to carry. Things are also special, I like it. The shell feels good, the workmanship is very meticulous, the snap switch is very simple, and it is also convenient to take thick and bright cut nails smoothly and smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave these even two stars is because of the price and amount of items this kit comes with. However, I was very very disappointed with the quality. The scissors are hard to open and close, the clippers are not sharp and barely cut anything, the cuticle clippers are horrendous.. needless to say, most of the items in this kit barely function and are essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if Cover didnt fallapart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile back listed on the Amazon Deals but didn't write a review. It popped back up and decided to share my thoughts. The tools are okay you can tell they were stamped out so edges are a little crude. The case its self is a disaster! It looks cute but within a few days of having it the glue that holds the plastic design to the metal backing began pulling away. I tried tucking it back in as there was plenty of glue still on the material. It stayed for a few minutes and started coming apart again, but what do you expect for the price. Lesson learned never going to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice on arrival. Second time using toenail clippers the top lever broke at pivot point. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tightlines

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I needed this?? Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to view what the case of this set looks like. Not the best for for the masculine people on your lives but it gets the job done! It only helped contribute to the quirkiness of this gift so I shouldn’t complain. Has everyone one would need for a manicure. Great price for a great set!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pate

customer_reviews.title: NOT QUITE WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: The individual items are fine. The case is trash. It is coming apart at the seams, literally. The individual items are just all over the case as the case and holder are made from cheap and non-duraple material. I won't buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH A. BISHOP

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit for home or on-the-go
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little kit with all sorts of tools for various situations. I have used all the tools in one way or another from clipping and cleaning nails, to tweezing out of place hairs and even cleaning my acne. Comes in good looking little carrying case, with the only mar being the bland look of the brand name. I painted and stylized it myself so no real harm.
customer_reviews.author: ali tayeb

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular manicure set. If this is something you have thought about but never indulged, it has everything you could possibly need. And it's in a beautiful folding case that makes it easy to travel with. Terrific!
customer_reviews.author: raymond s.

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new manicure kit. This one seems to be well made and contains quite a few items. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, flimsy case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set, but the case is falling apart. The tools are very sturdy and work great, it is just the case that fell apart. The cover material separated from the sides and it looks bad. That started about 3 months after I started carrying the case in my makeup kit.
customer_reviews.author: glk3

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For under $8.00 - this is a great mani/pedi set. There are so many tools, that I’m not sure what they are all for, but the clippers, and the cuticle removers are great, and it comes in a sturdy case. It’s not Tweezerman, or Sheisedo quality...but you’re also not paying for that. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky mom loved it! 😁
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. She loved it. And she's very picky about... ... EVERYTHING! ... So for her to tell me she loved it speaks volumes! 😐 I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be of good quality and works well. Case it comes in is real nice as well. Being a male i didn't think about it when ordering but the case does have a floral design. Doesn't really matter though. They kit is nice and does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod H.

customer_reviews.title: Good options with sharp instruments
customer_reviews.text: All the clippers were nice and sharp, so you don't have to spend 5 minutes filing off what was left behind. I've gotten a lot of use out of it considering I don't really do the nail-care thing. The V-shaped push stick could have been a little deeper. The individual pieces were a little difficult to get out of their slots, at first, and now they tend to fall out when you don't want them to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Koppy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set, great value for the price. It looks very classy.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set, great value for the price. It looks very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think I needed this....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a whim in deals for my daughter because it was cheap and she picks at her nails. Now I can’t imagine my house without this kit. I’m used it to fix hang nails, ingrown nails, trim the hair off my dogs hot spots, open up a pimple that needed to go (yeah, I know you arent supposed to, but you didn’t see it) and remove splinters. At least once a week “Where is that nail set?” is screamed across the house. Easily cleaned off with alcohol pads.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Decent set
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems like a pretty complete manicure kit that also includes a blackhead remover which I haven't used yet but am excited to have this extra product. Definitely what I was looking for quality could be a little better but not bad for the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was a nifty little purchase, my wife occasionally suffers with an ingrown toenail, after the last incident I decided to buy this to make it easier and less painful for her. This had all the tools I needed. Great quality tools. I'm very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Dagoberto Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make it far
customer_reviews.text: Started rusting and broke really easy. Didn’t last one manicure!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass. Better kits out there.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, as it looked like a pretty good kit. What I received was not a good kit. The case started to fall apart literally the day I opened it. A lot of the tools feel cheap, especially the scissors, and are not very good. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainExcellent

customer_reviews.title: Very feminine case
customer_reviews.text: Had I realized what the case looked like I wouldn't have bought it. Standard cheap tools. What do you expect for 9$
customer_reviews.author: Frugaloffgrid

customer_reviews.title: Not of high quality
customer_reviews.text: Not high quality. Not saying not to buy but you get what you pay for. Case is absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Emc

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy & damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Cheap & shoddy, with a broken loop inside the case so there's nowhere for the clippers to be secured. The tweezers are essentially useless because they aren't well enough made to really grasp fine hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Skolmsted

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality tools - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item. The nail clippers are not sharp and they just crunched my nails and left them rough and jagged. The tweezers were completely worthless. I haven't tried using the other tools but it seems like it is just money down the drain at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nail grooming kit in an attractive case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these kits for myself. I have bought two more as gifts. Good tools for clipping nails in a case that keeps everything organized. You can't beat this kit at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: It includes all as presented on picture. Size of ...
customer_reviews.text: It includes all as presented on picture. Size of case was a bit smaller than what image might make you believe (which in this case was even better). HardCase material does not look as slick as in second picture but no complaints due to price relation. No complaints. Arrived prompt and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A great value for the price. The case is only meh as far as looks (A little ugly) but I don’t plan on traveling with it. The tools themselves are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Save your Money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. One pair of trimmers wouldn’t cut my two year old’s nails at all and the other was extremely hard to cut through. Looks very similar to something you’d probably find at Dollar Tree.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and Well made set!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my concerns was whether or not the blades would be sharp. Upon purchasing I can confirm that the blades are very sharp and durable. This set is well worth the purchase. The customer service is also excellent! No worries.
customer_reviews.author: PerfectlyLeila

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: All of the tools seem to be made of high quality materials and the blades are sharp. This is the manicure set that I wish I had bought a long time ago instead of the crappy fingernail clippers that work a few times and then end up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good, as well as the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit. I am very pleased with this product as well as the transaction. It was a great deal for the cost! The quality of the metal used is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sti

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas last year. He still talks about how he likes this product. The tools are very well made and not rinky dink in anyway. The case is good quality and feel it was a great value for us.
customer_reviews.author: Fields

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: During this time when you can not go out and get your nails done this was a perfect fix! I like the compact way everything was placed and I can take it anywhere. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Professor A. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Torn Case - Good Items Inside
customer_reviews.text: Case already tore apart. I bought this to keep in my purse and I am not rough on the items in my purse. The case still closes but the material is coming undone at the seem. The items inside are as described. A bit heavy if you want to carry this item every day.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: No way you can go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several manicuring set in my life was this one is the best I’ve ever purchased that’s why I went back and purchased two others explain to my parents I will and how sharp they are. I’ve bought even sets made out of titanium and they couldn’t hold a candle to these.
customer_reviews.author: RUSS SCHWINGE

customer_reviews.title: Reflective of the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK set. I wasn’t terribly impressed. I ordered 2 sets, one for me & I was going to give the other as a gift. But one of cases wouldn’t stay closed. So I’ve returned one and I kept the other for myself just to have a nail kit all together.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a problem with it overall. The scissors are very cheap and bend very easy. But the clippers are fine. It’s not a pro level kit, but you shouldn’t expect that for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Durable, strong, and my favorite out of many.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything, the case and tools are good quality. I've bought several before this one and none of them were very durable, but this one is meant to last! The clippers and other tools are strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful thought, but disappointment in the end.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my mothee. I was excited to get the package, but disappointed at what I received. Although she really liked it, the quality was not exactly as advertised. The edges weren’t as “professional” as I expected, and the case clasp shut unevenly. I really think she was being more gracious than appreciative, by keeping this.
customer_reviews.author: MzKiesha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for travel and everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: This little kit is really nicely packaged in a padded case. The tools are sturdy and perform very well. Awesome product at a great price. Nice for stocking stuffier gifts at Christmas. Everyone can use one of these for travel or everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice manicure kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice manicure kit. Although, I can’t say I know how to use half of these tools, what I do know how to use works well (clippers, fine, etc.) I also really like the case that it comes in. It makes it easy to slip into my purse and keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi S

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great that I have used and it’s so far other than the street nail clipper for getting the sides is a little doll at the tip it doesn’t cut all the way so ends up having a hang nail... good for $8 though
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Cavone

customer_reviews.title: Best nail set ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been thru many nail sets in my time. And these are by far the best I have owned. They are beautiful and functional. I ordered 2 sets one for me and one for my hubby. I highly recommend. The case is also very pretty and great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Utter and total garbage - don’t waste your money on these cheap, poorly crafted and ineffective ‘tools’ Not sure these are even stainless. Plus the angles on the clippers are not OK
customer_reviews.author: D. Bolyard

customer_reviews.title: Equipment is good, case is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a year and use it infrequently. The tools themselves are solid and its a good selection. Unfortunately, the case is flimsy and has broken apart essentially making the case useless. The vinyl wrapping around the case started to disconnect from the metal seam. Once this happened, it was impossible to reconnect and the cardboard inner layer was exposed. This has no left the case separated and worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Tribble

customer_reviews.title: ... taking our stuff and losing it) It was very happy with what I got for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stocking stuffer for my teenage daughter ( she’s always taking our stuff and losing it) It was very happy with what I got for the price. It’s great quality and everything is in a cute little case that can fit easily into a purse.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Make sure disinfect before use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set, fair price! Make sure disinfect all before use, I read are available to return, It should not be a return product for the safety of the buyers It contains needles tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jehimy Martín

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: For a $10 manicure set, I was really impressed! With a really nice case to wrap it in. It has everything you need to do a nice job on your fingernails or toenails. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Warning to men! Very feminine case!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my grooming kit I misplaced. I'm not overly impressed as I'm a male and several of the review photos showed a more masculine case. Mine, however, is incredibly feminine so not entirely ideal. Also, I'm not impressed with the scissors included within. The non-razor edge is just as sharp as the cutting edge which makes trimming noise hairs quite painful, and I'm no snowflake. Odd to put that in a review, but that's one of the main reasons I needed a new grooming kit, so I figured I'd help a brother out.
customer_reviews.author: Brayd Mac

customer_reviews.title: Absolute fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing for the price...almost any two pieces from it would cost what it cost, and it seems to be thus far of very high quality. I keep it in my travel bag and people are impressed, a highly functional and showy little piece for a dapper gentleman. Could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Travis Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Personal Touch
customer_reviews.text: This grooming set is a good value for the money. The person for whom this was bought is ecstatic with it so far. Product was exactly as advertised and was delivered on the day/date promised.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dziemianowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised about how nice this set really is. I got this for my wife as a stocking stuffer and was not expecting the case to look as nice as it did for the price. The pieces all hair their own place to fit in the case, making it organized and compact. Definitely great purchase for a nice gift for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Tseoa Manicure, Pedicure Kit, Nail Clippers, Professional Grooming Kit, Nail Tools with Luxurious Travel Case, 12 pieces
product_meta.description: This nail kit including high quality nail clippers, cuticle pusher, cuticle nipper and other usefully accessories. They are manufactured by super careful processes of cutting, polishing, corrosion, laser engraving, plating, screen printing etc. Every product has been checked by strict quality inspection, packed in a beautiful portable case and a protective outer case. All of these ensure they would be in a perfect condition while your received it. It is suitable for all ages and unisex. This is a perfect Christmas gift or daily surprise gift to your families and friends. Package including: One toe nail clipper one nail clipper one diagonal nail clipper one multi purpose scissors one cuticle trimmer one ear pick one single edged double sided push stick one eyebrow tweezer one peeling knife one nail file one blackhead needle and loop remover one v shaped push stick one pu case.acked in a beautiful and portable case, including everything you need for your personal manicure, it is a surprise gift for both women and men.
feature_bullets: Includes toenail clipper, nail clipper, diagonal nail clipper, multi-purpose scissor, cuticle trimmer, ear pick, single-edged double-sided push stick, eyebrow tweezer, peeling knife, nail file, blackhead needle and loop remover, V-shaped push Stick.

12 pcs manicure pedicure kit comes with a beautiful and stylish case to protect the sharp tools, it is easily to close or open with a secure snap closure. The case is 3 inches by 6 inches, perfect for travel or just to keep it all in one place for home use.

Manicuring, pedicuring, eyebrow shaping, anti-acne, exfoliating ETC, only with one set and all done. Packed in a beautiful and portable case, including everything you need for your personal manicure, it is a surprise gift for both women and men.
These manicure pedicure sets are made of top high steel, pretty, sturdy and built to last. You will get your money's worth with this set and more.
Tseoa offers premium quality Manicure, Pedicure Kit. All of our products with 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed - 100% money refund, No questions asked and no hassles
